vulnerability.name: USN-4509-1
vulnerability.description: It was discovered that Perl DBI module incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2013-7490)  It was discovered that Perl DBI module incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information. (CVE-2014-10401)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in Perl DBI module. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
